entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
